text: Nirdista kichumana dina. Eteke tomalokara majata konoba'i asustha haâ€™le athaba bhramanata thakile, ana dinaborata e'i sankhya purana karai laba, arau yisakalara babe chiyama palana karaa kastasadhya sihamtara kartabya haiche iyara paraibarte phida'iya- ejana michakinaka khadya dana karaa. Yadi konoba'i sbeccha'i satkama karae tente seya tara babe kalyanakara; arau chiyama palana karaatorae tomalokara babe kalyanakara, yadi tomaloke janilahemtena
